## SseTransportConfig type

Runtime configuration for the SSE transport.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SseTransportConfig = {
    endpoint: string;
    query?: Record<string, string | number | boolean | null | undefined>;
    withCredentials?: boolean;
    retryIntervalMs?: number;
};
```
